messages.subject: Fishing today!
messages.msgSnippet: Such a unschooling time we had today. Went to the Pond and went fishing! Me and Austyn searched for snails and found ALOT! We put them in a jar and brought
messages.messageBody:
Such a unschooling time we had today. Went to the Pond and went fishing! Me
and Austyn searched for snails and found ALOT! We put them in a jar and
brought them home! They are now finding their new home in our fish tank!
Later we are going to look up snails online and learn about them!!

Caitlin loved being outdoors too, and my husband got to fish (But he caught
ZERO!!!)

Wendy
Wendy Carr
When the first baby laughed for the first time, the laugh broke into a
thousand pieces and they all went skipping about, and that was the beginning
of fairies. - Barrie
Mom to Austyn(8) and Caitlin(5 months)

Proud To Home-school!
